## ISystemDebugData.systemsInfo property

系统信息列表

**Signature:**

```text

        name&#58; string;
        type&#58; string;
        entityCount&#58; number;
        executionTime?: number;
        averageExecutionTime?: number;
        minExecutionTime?: number;
        maxExecutionTime?: number;
```
